amendment.description: To release certain wilderness study areas from management for preservation as wilderness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 166, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 39.

action.text: Amendment SA 166 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S514-518; text: CR S514-515) To release certain wilderness study areas from management for preservation as wilderness.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 166, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 39.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 166, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 39.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 166 proposed by Senator Murkowski to Amendment SA 2.
